name: replace
description: Replaces each substring of the specified field's value that matches the given regular expression with the given replacement.

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: The regular expression pattern to match

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field to perform replacement on. Defaults to @rawstring

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: The output field name. Can be same as input for in-place replacement

notes: Can use =~replace() syntax for inline field replacement. Supports regex patterns for complex matching.
